trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Boston
There were no other sightings in Boston on or around October 21st 2010
Summary: unknown objects in sky, total of five hovering lights
divs: sighting detailsaround 10 pm, oct. 21st, i was looking at the night sky from a third-story balcony. in the eastern sky were, 3 lights,in a perfect vetical line, and a bright light to the left flashing red. to the right,at exactly the same distance, was a flashing blue light. all lights were a perfect distance from one another. i called 3 of my friends outside to confirm. four of us saw the lights,and the red and blue ons appeared to be pulsing, or moving up and down. they weren't stars,or airplanes or sattelites. they held the same position for a couple hours at least, not moving with the stars or moon. 2 hours later, they were gone. any comments? thanks, *(wit's initials deleted -- cms\sg.
